name: Hillbilly Apocalypse
description: Once upon a time when all planet was in great danger the unknown enemy turned everyone into zombies. Chaos came. The rest of people are had to survive. It seems that everything has come to an end...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz and better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
